reviewText:
Not as good a film as I had hoped-it is an older film and has lost some of it's color. The information is good however.
Arrived on time and pacakged well
Old film, colour poor, should go free with the cantate domino
Interesting. But video quality was somewhat dated.
Detailex explanation was easy to understand

well anything dealing with the greatest sculptor and artist of all time is deffinetly pleasing. i was just a little dissapointed in the lack of creativity for the narration and resolution of the imagery.
I can't imagine anything that they could add to this documentary that could make it any worse.  We turned it off after 5 minutes.  Wow.
Watching this DVD I was amazed at how exceptionally bad it is: worst than amateurish. Don't waste your money!!!
A nice intro to the chapel for someone who will be going there.

This video really engages beginning Art History students because they can witness the restoration of the Sistine Chapel step by step from both detractors and promotors points of view.  The issue is whether the restoration is an improvement or a travesty.  Even those knew to art can put forth an educated opinion after viewing.  Nova should reissue this video.
